name: rdflib
description: an RDF library for node.js. Suitable for client and server side.

scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:serialize
scripts.test:serialize:npm: npm run lib && npm run serialize-tests && npm run cleantest
scripts.all: npm run dist && npm run dist/rdflib.js && npm run dist/rdflib.min.js
scripts.detach: git checkout origin/master &&  git reset--hard HEAD
scripts.gh-pages: npm run detach && git branch - D gh - pages ||: && git checkout - b gh - pages && npm run all && git add - f dist /*.js src/*.js *.js && git commit -m 'gh-pages: update to latest' && git push -f origin gh-pages && git checkout master
scripts.serialize-tests: npm run serialize-test-1 && npm run serialize-test-2 && npm run serialize-test-3 && npm run serialize-test-4 && npm run serialize-test-5 && npm run serialize-test-6 && npm run serialize-test-7 && npm run serialize-test-10 && npm run serialize-test-11 && npm run serialize-test-12 && npm run serialize-test-13
scripts.serialize-test-2: cd tests/serialize/sample_files && node ./data.js -in=t2.ttl -format=application/rdf+xml  -out=,t2.xml && node diff ,t2.xml t2-ref.xml
scripts.serialize-test-3: cd tests/serialize/sample_files && node ./data.js -in=t3.ttl -format=application/rdf+xml  -out=,t3.xml && node diff ,t3.xml t3-ref.xml
scripts.serialize-test-4: cd tests/serialize/sample_files && node ./data.js -in=t3.ttl -out=,t4.ttl && node diff ,t4.ttl t4-ref.ttl
scripts.serialize-test-5: cd tests/serialize/sample_files && node ./data.js -in=t5.n3 -format=text/turtle -out=,t5.ttl && node diff ,t5.ttl t5-ref.ttl
scripts.serialize-test-6: cd tests/serialize/sample_files && node ./data.js -in=t5.n3 -format=text/n3 -out=,t6.n3 && node diff ,t6.n3 t6-ref.n3
scripts.serialize-test-7: cd tests/serialize/sample_files && node ./data.js -in=t7.n3 -format=application/n-triples -out=,t7.nt && node diff ,t7.nt t7-ref.nt
scripts.serialize-test-8: cd tests/serialize/sample_files && node ./data.js -in=t5.n3  -format=application/n-quads -dump=,t8.nq && node diff ,t8.nq t8-ref.nq
scripts.serialize-test-9: cd tests/serialize/sample_files && node ./data.js -in=t7.n3 -format=application/ld+json -out=,t9.json && node diff ,t9.json t9-ref.json
scripts.serialize-test-10: cd tests/serialize/sample_files && node ./data.js -in=details.ttl -format=text/turtle -out=,t10.ttl && node diff ,t10.ttl t10-ref.ttl
scripts.serialize-test-11: cd tests/serialize/sample_files && node ./data.js -in=structures.n3 -format=application/rdf+xml  -out=,structures.xml && node diff ,structures.xml t11-ref.xml
scripts.serialize-test-12: cd tests/serialize/sample_files && node ./data.js -in=structures.n3 -format=text/turtle -out=,structures.ttl && node diff ,structures.ttl t12-ref.ttl
scripts.serialize-test-13: cd tests/serialize/sample_files && node ./data.js -in=structures.n3 -format=application/n-triples -out=,structures.nt && node ./data.js -format=application/n-triples -in=,structures.nt -format=text/turtle -out=,structures.nt.ttl && node diff ,structures.nt.ttl t13-ref.ttl
